doc.after: There are about 20 permanent or seasonal theaters and stages The Croatian National Theater in Zagreb was built in 1895 and opened by emperor Franz Joseph I of Austria The most renowned concert hall is named Vatroslav Lisinski after the composer of the first Croatian opera was built in 1973
